experienceData.title: Software Developer
experienceData.description: I am part of the development team for the OfficeSharp Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Program at Zeugma. Our team is working on backend development using the .Net Framework. I am involved as a full-stack developer in the development of desktop, web, and mobile applications.

experienceData.title: Intern
experienceData.description: I interned at Motor Aşin, contributing to the web development process. I assisted in preparing the company's website and supported the IT team in their work on servers and virtual machines.

experienceData.title: Computer Engineering
experienceData.description: Graduated from the Computer Engineering department at Marmara University.
